SA11n1123:9: tenedaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati- yadidaṃ alpādhamabhogenāpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayamanyairvā bahūttamabhoganāśanopekṣā na kāryeti ||
SA11n1123:12: adhikasattvārthaśaktestulyaśaktervā bodhisattvasya adhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāviti siddhaṃ bhavatīti ||
SA11n1123:13: idaṃ ca saṃdhāya bodhisattvaprātimokṣe'bhihitam- yastu khalu punaḥ śāriputra abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvo bodhyaṅgairabhiyuktaḥ tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyam |
SA11n1123:18: yaśca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād,
SA11n1123:19: yaśca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatva ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayet,
SA11n1123:23: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaveddhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ,
SA11n1123:24: tena sādhāraṇa bhojinā bhavitavyaṃ sārdha sabrahmacāribhiḥ |
SA11n1123:25: sacetpunaḥ kaścidevāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ va yāceta,
SA11n1123:32: sacetpunaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhavet,
SA11n1123:34: yastu khalu punaḥ śāriputra abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvaḥ,
SA11n1123:37: anyathā hyekasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ sattvarāśestasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvāśayaparikarmāntarāyānmahato'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syāt |
SA11n1123:40: atyāgapratiṣedho'pi yathā- āryasāgaramatisutre mahāyānāntarāyeṣu bahulābhatā pajyate |
SA11n1123:42: so'nyasminnāpi bodhisattve pratipādyaḥ iti kuto gamyate?
SA11n1123:51: tathā ca dharmasaṃgītau sārthavāho bodhisattva āha- yo bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhimicchati, nātmanaḥ |
SA11n1123:54: kiṃ tu sattvārthahānibhayādayogye sattve svabhāraṃ nāropayati |
SA11n1123:56: tatra svayaṃ kṛtamanyena vā jagaddhitamācaritamiti ko viśeṣaḥ?
SA11n1123:62: yathā ca ratnakūṭasūtre- catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisattvapratirūpakā ityārabhyoktam-ātmasukhārthiko bhavati na sarvasattvaduḥkhāpanayanārthika iti ||
SA11n1123:64: eṣā tu bodhisattvaśikṣā yathā āryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṃgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā-kathaṃ kulaputrāḥ pratipattisthitā veditavyāḥ?
SA11n1123:67: āha-yanmaitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti |
SA11n1123:69: āha-yatkāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ niryātayanti,
SA11n1123:71: āha- katamā bodhisattvānāṃ mahākaruṇā yatpūrvataraṃ sattvānāṃ bodhimicchanti nātmana iti ||
SA11n1123:76: anyathā tu kevalameva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt ||
SA11n1123:77: yatta praśāntaviniścayaprātihāryasūtre deśitam- ya eṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahastreṇa parivyayo'tra praviṣṭaḥ,
SA11n1123:78: sa sarvaḥ piṇḍīkṛtyaikasya bhikṣoryātrā bhavedevaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇām |
SA11n1123:79: yaścoddeśasvādhyāyābhiyukto bodhisattvaḥ sagauravo dharmakāmaḥ śraddhādeyamāhāraṃ parigṛhyaivaṃ cittamutpādayet-anenāhaṃ dharmaparyeṣṭimāpatsya iti |
SA11n1123:80: asya kuśalasyaiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaitīti,
SA11n1123:86: yathoktaṃ nārāyaṇaparipṛcchāyām- sa nātmahetoḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati,
SA11n1123:98: sa evaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisattvo daśabhidharmairna hīyate |
SA11n1123:105: evaṃ śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaskṛto bhavati devaiḥ |
SA11n1123:122: evaṃ pūrvotsṛṣṭasyāpi puṇyasya kleśavaśātpunarupādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā |
SA11n1123:123: puṇyadānādapi yatpuṇyaṃ tato'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo'nyatra parārthāt |
SA11n1123:131: anekaparyāyeṇa hi bhagavatā pracchannakalyāṇatā vivṛtapāpatā varṇitā |
SA11n1123:139: idaṃ ca ratnakūṭe'bhihitam-caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisattvasyotpannotpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante |
SA11n1123:146: āryasarvāstivādināṃ ca [ vinaye] paṭhayate- paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvāṅgena praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam?
SA11n1123:147: evaṃ bhadanta anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmirākrāntā adho'śītiyojanasahastrāṇi yāvatkāñcanacakram |
SA11n1123:148: atrāntare yāvantyo vālikāstāvantyanena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahastrāṇi paribhoktavyāni |
SA11n1123:149: yāvadathāyuṣmānupāliryena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat- yaduktaṃ bhagavatā asya bhikṣorevaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni |
SA11n1123:150: kutremāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti?
SA11n1123:151: nāhamupāle evaṃ kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi |
SA11n1123:153: atropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti |
SA11n1123:154: tasmāttarhyupāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yaddagdhasthūṇāyāmapi cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ prāgeva savijñānake kāya iti ||
SA11n1123:157: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasattvaparitrāṇyojaḥśriyā rātridevatayā pūrvāvadānaṃ kathayantyā abhihitam- te tenānyonyāvamanyanāsamuditenākuśalamūlenāyuḥpramāṇādapi parihīyante sma |
SA11n1123:159: atra ca na kadācidunnatiḥ kāryeti pradarśanārthaṃ sadetyucyate ||
SA11n1123:161: yathoktaṃ āryaratnameghe- iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ sumerumātramapi ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti,
SA11n1123:164: tasyaivaṃ bhavati-ete sattvā matsariṇo lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ |
SA11n1123:165: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhāvaṣṭabdhā iva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ kurvanti |
SA11n1123:168: na lobhacittamutpādayati anyatra sarvasattvasādhāraṇāṃ buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārāṃ karoti |
SA11n1123:171: tathā atraivoktam-tena ca dānena nonnato bhavatīti ||
SA11n1123:172: punaratraivāha- yadi punarasya taddhetostatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati,
SA11n1123:175: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- nacireṇa kālena yasya cāyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthāpito yaśca kīrtiśabdaślokaḥ,
SA11n1123:177: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣvadhruvepvanāśvāsikeṣvanunayacittamutpādayedunnato bhavenmānadarpito vā?
SA11n1123:179: punarāha- caṇḍālakumāropamāśca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā |
SA11n1123:181: punarapyuktam- iha kulaputra abhiniṣkrāntagṛhavāsaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvo mṛtakasadṛśo'haṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāmiti nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:184: anyaśca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛtta iti nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:185: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulātkulamupasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetorbhikṣānidānamiti nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:186: nīcanīcena cittana caṇḍālakumārasaddaśena piṇḍāya carāmīti nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:188: parapratibaddhā ca me jīviketi nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:190: ārādhanīyā me ācāryagurudakṣīṇīyā iti nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:191: saṃtoṣaṇīyā me sabrahmacāriṇo yaduta tena tenācāragocarasamudācāreṇeti nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:192: apratilabdhān buddhadharmān pratipatsya iti nihatamāno bhavati |
SA11n1123:193: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmīti nihatamāno bhavatīti ||
SA11n1123:198: sa kiyaddhīnānāmapi sattvānāṃ rūpavikalānāmapyavanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatāmupādāyeti ||
SA11n1123:201: tasya nimnatvādalpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaśca sarvaprastravaṇāni ca prapatanti |
SA11n1123:202: evameva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisattvasyālpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śrotrendriyasyābhāsamāgacchanti |
SA11n1123:204: tasmāttarhi bhagavan yo bodhisattvo mānonnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ,
SA11n1123:206: veditavyaṃ bhagavan mārāṅkuśāviddho batāyaṃ bodhisattva iti ||
SA11n1123:207: āryalokottaraparivarte coktam-daśemāni bho jinaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mārakarmāṇi |
SA11n1123:214: mārakarmadharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇaḥ udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ na prayacchati mā kaścidasmin praśaṃsatīti mārakarma ||
SA11n1123:220: adhimānaṃ cotpādyājānannabudhyamāno varṇārhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati |
SA11n1123:224: jānāti ca - ayaṃ dharmo'yaṃ vinayo bhūtamidaṃ buddhavacanamiti |
SA11n1123:247: na paripṛcchati- kiṃ kuśalaṃ kimakuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati,
SA11n1123:259: sa evaṃdharmavihārī sthānametadvidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet |
SA11n1123:264: imāni bho jinaputra daśa mārakarmāṇiyāni parivarjya bodhisattvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhate |
SA11n1123:272: dharmasaṃgītisūtre'pyuktam- sattvakṣetraṃ bodhisattvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataśca buddhakṣetrādbuddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāgamo bhavati |
SA11n1123:274: evaṃ cāsya bhavati-sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca sattvānniśritya pravartate |
SA11n1123:277: ata eva ratnolkādhāraṇyāmapyuktam- iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva sarvasattvānāmantike daśaprakāraṃ cittamutpādayati |
SA11n1123:279: tadyathā- hitacittatāṃ sukhacittatāṃ dāyācittatāṃ snigdhacittatāṃ priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatām |
SA11n1123:287: lokaprasādānurakṣārtha tvāsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatāpi cetasā strīṣu vā akṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisattvena premagauravābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ ||
SA11n1123:288: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe- tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhāsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito'bhūt tameva rājānaṃ namasyamānaḥ |
SA11n1123:290: sa khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ sahadarśanenāttamanaskataro rājñānena ca trisāhastracakravartirājyapratilābhenāsīmāprāptakalpaparyavasānena(?)
SA11n1123:292: tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasyaikāntatṛṣṇācaritasya mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginīmitrāmātyajñātisālohitaputraduhitṛbhāryācirakālaviyuktasyāṭavīkāntāravipraṇaṣṭasya taddarśanakāmasya teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītiradhyavasānamutpatet taddarśanāvitṛptatayā |
SA11n1123:293: evameva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍala nirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ sahadarśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ |
SA11n1123:295: mahāṃścittodagratāvegaḥ prādurbhūto yāvatteṣu sarvayācanakeṣu ekaputrakasaṃjñā mātāpitṛsaṃjñā dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā varṇasaṃjñā durlabhasaṃjñā duṣkarakārakasaṃjñā bahukarasaṃjñā paramopakārisaṃjñā bodhimārgopastambhasaṃjñā ācāryaśāstṛsaṃjñotpadyeteti ||
SA11n1123:301: yathoktaṃ bhikṣuprakīrṇake-bhagavānāha- mā bhāya bhikṣu mā bhāya bhikṣu |
SA11n1123:304: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat- mā bhagavānetasya glānasyāśucimrakṣitāni cīvarāṇi dhovatu |
SA11n1123:306: bhagavānāha- tena hyānanda tvametasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhova |
SA11n1123:308: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando tasya glānasya bhikṣusya cīcarāṇi dhovati |
SA11n1123:311: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastaṃ glānaṃ bhikṣuṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya bahirdhā haritvā snāpayet |
SA11n1123:315: ete te vai sattvāḥ prasādya yān siddhimāgatā bahavaḥ |
SA11n1123:323: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīcīṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt ||
SA11n1123:325: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvadyadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapekṣā |
SA11n1123:326: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam ||
SA11n1123:327: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum |
SA11n1123:332: tadadya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditāste munayaḥ kṣamantām ||
SA11n1123:334: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ ||
SA11n1123:335: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo'tra |
SA11n1123:336: dṛśyanta ete nanu satvarūpāḥ ta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro'tra ||
SA11n1123:341: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam |
SA11n1123:350: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥ sausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi ||
SA11n1123:363: yathoktaṃ ratnameghe-kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisattvo'yoniśomanaskārāpagato bhavati?
SA11n1123:364: iha bodhisattva ekākī rahogataḥ pravivekasthito naivaṃ cittamutpādayatiahaṃ asaṃkīrṇavihārī |
SA11n1123:367: ye tvanye śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā,
SA11n1123:373: tasyaivaṃ bhavati- ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmābhiyuktaḥ parāṃścodayet ||
SA11n1123:376: tathā hyuktamāryākṣayamatisūtre- na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyāntarā kaścitparikṣayo yāvadbodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt |
SA11n1123:377: tadyathāpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyodakabindornāntarāsti kṣayo yāvanna kalpaparyavasānaḥ |iti ||
